i did my job. but what did i do! i went out. i was 18 years old! at 18, you're going to sorority parties. i just did it in the public eye. i certainly wasn't showing my crotch. just because i was on 90210 didn't mean that i didn't get to have my own real life experiences. you have to live somewhat normally. and Shannen Doherty says she's already made plans to settle far away from the limelight, where she hopes to start a family.
